Class AppConfig

java.lang.Object
io.dropwizard.Configuration
it.unimore.iot.health.api.datamanager.services.AppConfig
public class AppConfig extends io.dropwizard.Configuration
AppConfig extends the Configuration class allowing us to define our own configuration

  • Method Details

    • getInventoryDataManager

      public IInventoryDataManager getInventoryDataManager()
      Inside AppConfig we have defined an "interface" type variable without specifying the class that implements it, because the implementation of this interface is done in InventoryDataManager which manages the data in the local memory, through HashMap. This is because if in the future we want to manage data through a database, just make a new implementation of the IInventoryDataManager interface, and inside getInventoryDataManager() we only need to change the following line of code:

      this.inventoryDataManagerInterface = new SqlDatabaseInventoryDataManager ();

      This allows making other components of the application not care about how the data manager is implemented, as long as it respects the correct interface.
      Returns:
      the IInventoryDataManager variable previously declared
